cu.explanation_en: Setting the remote SCTP port C to an out-of-range value of 99999 will cause SCTP connection failures and F1 interface errors.

du.explanation_en: Setting the maximum transmit power pMax to an excessively high value of 100 dBm will cause invalid power configuration and transmission issues.
du.explanation_zh: 將最大傳輸功率 pMax 設定為過高的 100 dBm 值會導致無效的功率配置，並造成傳輸問題。
